input.activity_signal: Company website (telnyx.com) found via web search showing current Voice AI and telecommunications services. BBB business profile indicates active telecommunications operations. Recent 2025 FCC regulatory activity with proposed $4.5 million fine for robocall violations suggests ongoing business operations and regulatory engagement.
input.product_summary: Telnyx provides Voice AI agents and telecommunications infrastructure services over a private global network, including conversational AI agents, speech-to-text transcription, and text-to-speech capabilities.
